Articles.Content:
running ksp on 1.12.5 (tried older versions, same issue). game keeps crashing during loading with nothing i do seeming to work

sometimes it makes it to the end of loading and crashes on "expansion loading complete"

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1R8vNp1G-EbGp5grlYvsRAldfocjlavGd?usp=sharing

modlist & logs are in the drive link above

all mods are also up to date
